comment: @onlyyoontv At least they are taking it seriously and not trying to cover up like some sort of pr problem.  Looks like Xi is more tuned in to the world than previous Communist leaders. Chernobyl should have been a lesson to all of them. Communist leaders are so rigid in their actions.
